# dataedu <img src="https://i.ibb.co/F76nyTh/hex.png" align = "right" height="150"/>

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of dataedu is to provide readers of [Data Science in Education Using R](https://github.com/data-edu/data-science-in-education) with a package with references and data from the book.

## Installation

You can install the released version of dataedu from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("dataedu")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ivelasq/dataedu")
```
